text: @ochocinco I lost my dad due to Covid-19 and where is nursing home was back in my hometown Harrisburg PA made everything difficult with his proper burial. I want to get my dad tombstone and see where they have his memorial. Times been had no funds to travel. I cry every single day $Key75781 https://t.co/c1xYDSpW4n
